## Derivatives in R

```{r}
fx <- expression(x^2)

df_dx <- D(expr = fx, name = 'x')

df_dx

# Evaluate the slope of f(x) at x = 831

x <- seq(from = -10, to = 10, by = 0.5)

eval(expr = df_dx)
```
```{r}
gt <- expression(3 * t ^ 2 - 4 * cos(t))

dg_dt <- D(expr = gt, name = 't')

dg_dt
```
```{r}
gb <- expression(exp(x))

dg_db <- D(expr = gb, name = 'x')

dg_db
```
```{r}
fn <- expression((n ^ 9) * 120 * n)

df_dn <- D(expr = fn, name = 'n')

n <- 322

eval(expr = df_dn)
```
